detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract BlueDefi (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BlueDefi.sol#51-164) has payable functions:
	 - BlueDefi.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BlueDefi.sol#161-163)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
